name: Furever Team
description:
Please NOTE: This game has been created by BLANK and permitted us to publish on our page to support the 'Games Against War' charity bundle. After the bundle finished, the game's price be changed.

Short Description:

Kittgard was a great castle full of happy servants and knights ruling by MEOWTHUR the King. But once evil mimics occupied the castle, peaceful peasants started to disappear. Seeing it, the king gathers the Circle of Four. Along with Meowinn the Thief, Meowrlin the Blue and Meowrcival the Braveheart Meowthur decides to push back mimics and their sneaky servants.

Now YOU are the only one who can help the king free his friends and castle! Do not delay!

Controls:

A, D or <--, --> | to move;

W or SPACE | to jump;

For Meowinn the Thief | Double Space or Double W to double jump

For Meowrlin the Blue | Press E to Teleport

For Meowrcival the Braveheart | Press Z to Knight Hit

Credits:

Fantasy cats drowned and animated by 9e0
